attachmentHtml:
PC Number: 2009-0265

Date: 2009-02-12

Whereas the Honourable Lynn B. MacDonald, a Judge of Her Majesty’s Court of Queen’s Bench for Saskatchewan, has become afflicted with a permanent infirmity disabling her from the due execution of her office and has tendered her resignation;

 

Therefore, Her Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Justice, hereby

(a) accepts the resignation of the Honourable Lynn B. MacDonald; and

(b) pursuant to paragraph 42(1)(c) of the Judges Act, grants to the Honourable Lynn B. MacDonald an annuity of $173,333.33, to commence on the date of this Order in Council and to continue during her life.

 


Attendu que l’honorable Lynn B. MacDonald, juge de la Cour du Banc de la Reine de la Saskatchewan, a donné sa démission pour incapacité par suite d’une infirmité permanente,

 

À ces causes, sur recommandation du ministre de la Justice, Son Excellence la Gouverneure générale en conseil :

 

a) accepte la démission de l’honorable Lynn B. MacDonald;

b) en vertu de l’alinéa 42(1)c) de la Loi sur les juges, accorde à l’honorable Lynn B. MacDonald, à titre viager, une pension annuelle de 173 333,33 $, payable à compter de la date du présent décret.
